title: Thynaptic Research: Cognitive-Local Language Models Technical Publications
description: Technical publications documenting Cognitive-Local Language Models (C-LLMs), adaptive cognitive architectures, evaluation frameworks, and system implementations. This repository contains technical reports (TR-Series), benchmark evaluations, architectural whitepapers, and supporting documentation for Aurora, the first production C-LLM system. All publications follow Thynaptic Research House Style Guide and document evidence-grounded cognitive architectures operating independently of model inference.
notes: This repository contains technical publications for Zenodo archival and DOI assignment. Publications are organized by category: TR-Reports (technical research reports), Benchmarks (evaluation frameworks), Whitepapers (architectural documentation), and Diagrams (visual documentation). All publications maintain consistency with Thynaptic Research House Style Guide and provide evidence-grounded documentation of cognitive architectures.
method: This repository archives technical publications documenting Cognitive-Local Language Model (C-LLM) architecture, implementation, and evaluation. Publications follow Thynaptic Research House Style Guide with evidence-grounded claims, measurable metrics, and architectural documentation. All reports undergo internal review for accuracy and compliance with publication standards.
